short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extension that adds the common responses in Roman Catholic masses to each reading.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Often you use the USCCB website to read the readings for the day, especially virtually in a group. This plugin just adds the pre and post text that the proclaimer of the word says in Roman Catholic mass to aid in confidently reading it in person.
